thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Europe, Asia Stocks Rebound After U.S. Highs

author: Jon Sindreu
title: Europe, Asia Stocks Rebound After U.S. Highs
text:
Stocks on track to set new closing records Bank earnings in focus Euro jumps on German coalition-government deal Shares of banks climbed following a flurry of earnings reports and retailers continued to rally, hurtling major U.S. indexes toward a trifecta of records.
Stocks continued their meteoric rise, a sign for many investors that the long-running rally that powered the Dow Jones Industrial Average and the S&P 500 to double-digit gains last year isnâ€™t finished yet.
